title: Acceleration Module
description:
Acceleration Module technology is technology that upgrades a player's exocraft. 

The three upgrades for the basic Acceleration Module have been obsolete since NEXT.

title: Acid
description:
Dilute acid for high current generation in diverse power cells. 

Crafted from Mordite and Fungal Mould.

title: Advanced Exocraft Laser
description: Increases power of the Exocraft Mining Laser.

infobox.stats: +20% Mining Laser Power, +100% Advanced Exocraft Mining Laser

title: Advanced Mining Laser
description:
Replaces standard Mining Beam optics with high-grade Living Glass, allowing the beam to be effective against large and/or rare resource deposits.

The lens adapts automatically to minute fluctuations in the beam waveform, minimising scatter and increasing device mining potential.

infobox.stats:
Advanced Mining Laser: Enabled
+15% Mining Speed

title: Advanced Translator
description:
An Automatic translation device. It records and parses nearby conversations before running the data through a contextual learning system to determine intended meaning.

A large memory array and overclocked language processors allow the real-time translation of significant chunks of speech.

title: Agricultural Specialist's Room
description:
Integrated freighter research equipment tailored to the needs of farmers, and equipped for the analysis and cultivation of farmable crops.

This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.

title: Air Filtration Unit
description:
Double-vacuumed air filtration systems allow no trace of the planetary atmosphere into the Exocraft cabin without being thoroughly scrubbed.

Entirely prevents all damage or energy drain while inside an Exocraft in toxic environments.

title: Airburst Engine
description:
A powerful upgrade for the Exosuit Jetpack, allowing limited jetpack recharging while airborne.

Highly efficient compressors fitted around the jetpack exhaust take advantage of the windflow generated by persistent falling, recycling some of that energy into jetpack fuel.

title: Alloy Arch
description:
Reinforced Alloy building module, widespread in basic structures across the galaxy.

Conforms to Universal Building Standards 2.3b, ensuring maximum compatibilty with other prefab structurs. Rapid Grid snapping allows for quick assembly of custom shelter layouts

title: Alternative Landing Pad
description: A stable, reinforced landing pad for starships.

title: Amino Chamber
description:
A specialist biological catalyzation device.

This unit takes advantage of naturally occurring enzymes in order to facilitate increased energy yields and faster processing in a wide range of advanced technologies.

title: Amplified Cartridges
description: Specialist harmonic resonators allow the Pulse Spitter to split inserted ammunition, effective

title: Amplified Warp Shielding
description:
Upgrades the hyperdrive's core bounding magnets, preventing rapid disassembly when attempting to reach rare-class red stellar bodies.

User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems via the Galactic Map.

title: Analysis Visor Upgrade
description: Analysis Visor Upgrades, contained within Scanner Modules, are procedurally generated upgrades granting bonuses to a Multi-tool's Analysis Visor and Scanner.

title: Angled Flat Alloy Roof
description:
Reinforced Alloy building module, widespread in basic structures across the galaxy.

Conforms to Universal Building Standards 2.3b, ensuring maximum compatibilty with other prefab structurs. Rapid Grid snapping allows for quick assembly of custom shelter layouts

description:
Reinforced Stone building module, widespread in basic structures across the galaxy.

Conforms to Universal Building Standards 2.3b, ensuring maximum compatibilty with other prefab structurs. Rapid Grid snapping allows for quick assembly of custom shelter layouts

title: Animus Beam
description:
A unique overload to the Multi-Tool's standard mining laser. Beam frequency is modulated precisely in a feedback loop with the delta-waves generated by the impact target.

Recordings of the target's experiences are thus etched into tiny fragments of metal and rendered as Fragmented Qualia. Readability of collected fragments is not guaranteed.

title: Anomaly Decal
description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal depicts Traveller Anomaly.

title: Antimatter
description:
Contained negative matter and baryogenesis antiparticles.

The vast energy potential of antimatter makes it highly valuable. 95% of existing antimatter consumption is in the powering of starship hyperdrives.

WARNING: uncontained usage is not recommended.

title: Antimatter Housing
description:
Secure antimatter containment device, required before Antimatter can be safely secured as Warp Cells.

Rebound Oxygen forms a protective gas pocket, preventing the antimatter from reacting with the surrounding casing.

title: Apollo Decal
description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal depicts the Traveller Apollo.

title: Appearance Modifier Room
description:
Integrated freighter equipment allowing the user to adjust their personal appearance settings. This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.

The module applies advanced holographic techniques to recalibrate the light around the user, allowing them to adopt whatever appearance they desire. Visual data must be properly formatted before use.

title: Archive Bypass Implant
description: A biotechnical firewall, developed as a safeguard against textual cognitohazards.  It is coated in something slippery, and has started to bubble along the surface.

title: Ariadne's Flame
description:
A series of agile, high-powered jet thrusters mounted to the rear of the rear of the Minotaur. Precise use allows the Minotaur to quickly and powerfully traverse all manner of terrain.

Press and hold JUMP/IMG to activate. Limited in-flight control is possible.

title: Aronium
description:
A lightweight and highly malleable alloy. Crafted from Paraffinium and Ionised Cobalt.

In high demand on the Galactic Trade Network due to its utility in the construction of planetside outposts and facilities.

title: Artemis Decal
description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal depicts the Traveller Artemis.

title: Artemis' Translator
description:
An automatic translation device. Device must be calibrated by pre-loading with existing translation data. Device must have network connection to Artemis to function.

Without access to host translation service, on-board circuit allows limited real-time translation of a small number of words.

title: Asymmetrical Timber-Glass Roof
description:
Reinforced Timber building module, widespread in basic structures across the galaxy.

Conforms to Universal Building Standards 2.3b, ensuring maximum compatibilty with other prefab structurs. Rapid Grid snapping allows for quick assembly of custom shelter layouts

title: Atlantid Drive
description:
Sideloads a resonant memory packet into your warp computer, allowing the ship to pass through the dissonant space surrounding purple stellar bodies.

User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems via the Galactic Map.

title: Atlas Decal
description: Placeable decorative decals.

title: Atlas Infinity Poster
description: Self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

title: Atlas Race Poster
description: Self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

title: AtlasPass v1
description:
Security and permissions pass granted to specific travellers by many primary galactic species.

Provides access to low level restricted areas and outpost systems.

title: AtlasPass v2
description:
Security and permissions pass granted to specific travellers by many primary galactic species.

Provides access to mid-tier restricted areas and outpost systems.

title: AtlasPass v3
description:
Security and permissions pass granted to specific travellers by many primary galactic species.

Provides access to high level restricted areas and outpost systems.

title: Atmospheric Control Unit
description:
A critical freighter subsystem, vital for maintaining a habitable and safe environment for all on-board organic lifeforms.

Capable of generated

title: Auto Switch
description:
A power management device, this switch will toggle the flow of power when signaled by an incoming signal.

Switches require both power and signal wires to control a device.

title: Autonomous Positioning Unit
description:
A container of positioning units and associated wiring.

These APS units can be used to turn virtually any technology into a self-navigating system. Highly valuable in power generation economies, where they're used to remove conductive organic hands from the manufacturing process.

title: Barrel Ioniser
description:
Inserts a powerful field ionisation device into the barrel of the Boltcaster, increasing projectile stability through the air.

Improves device accuracy and allows the user to fire for longer periods without degrading combat performance.

title: Barricade
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Base Teleport Module
description:
A personal teleport device, allowing the user to move quickly between their constructed bases, as well as any Space Station Terminuses connected to their network.

User is urged to verify network integrity before inserting any matter they cannot afford to become separated from.

infobox.desc: Instant method of moving great distances

title: Battery
description:
Highly-efficient energy storage units. Connect to a power grid, and onboard power management circuits will automatically draw down spare capacity to charge its cells.

When the grid attempts to draw more power than is currently supplied, the battery will automatically deploy power to make up the shortfall.

title: Bio-Dome
description: An attractive domed room which is perfect for cultivating a wide range of botanical matter.

title: Biofuel Reactor
description:
A small power generator. Burns carbon-based fuel placed in its furnace tank and converts it into usable power.

Connect power generators to base structures and technologies with electrical wiring. Many parts require power to function.

title: Black Design Decal
description: Placeable decorative decals.

title: Blaze Javelin Upgrade
description:
Blaze Javelin Upgrades, contained within Blaze Javelin Modules, are procedurally generated upgrades granting bonuses to a Multi-tool's Blaze Javelin.

These were added as part of the new upgrade system introduced in the NEXT update.

title: Blob Decal
description: Placeable decorative decals.

title: Blue Design Decal
description: Placeable decorative decals.

title: Blue Stripes Poster
description: Self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

title: Boltcaster
description:
Generalist weapon attachment for the Multi-Tool. Access fire mode by pressing [Triangle/G] and fire weapon with [R2/Left Mouse Button].

The Boltcaster reconfigures the Multi-Tool to supercharge Metallic Elements, firing them as high-velocity projectiles capable of causing extreme damage.

title: Boltcaster Ricochet Module
description: Boltcaster Ricochet Module is a technology that augments the Boltcaster, a Multi-tool weapon. Its effects stack with those provided by Boltcaster Upgrades, but this technology does not count toward the three-upgrade limit, making it useful for triggering stronger upgrade bonuses on those upgrades. A blueprint can be purchased from Iteration: Eos for 90

title: Boltcaster SM
description:
Boltcaster shots deliver added physical damage upon impact.

Grants additional kinetic energy to the user's ionised plasma distribution systems.

Operates automatically once constructed within user's multi-tool inventory.

title: Boltcaster Upgrade
description: Boltcaster Upgrades, contained within Boltcaster Modules, are procedurally generated Upgrade Modules granting bonuses to the Multi-tool's Boltcaster.

title: Brick Pile
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Bulkhead Door
description:
A thick, robust door.

Hermeetically sealed for installation in the freighter hull, or between internal corridors and rooms.

title: Button
description:
A power management device, the switch will toggle the flow of power when used.

Switches require both power and signal wires to control a device.

title: Cactus Flesh Poster
description: Self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

title: Canvas Divider
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Canvas Gazebo
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

Conforms to Universal Building Standards 2.3b, ensuring maximum compatibilty with other prefab structurs. Rapid Grid snapping allows for quick assembly of custom shelter layouts

title: Capped Standing Light
description: A low-energy consumption light, with an extended lifespan and fully recyclable components.

title: Cargo Bulkhead
description:
A technology module harvested from the remains of an abandoned freighter found floating in space. May also be salvaged during frigate expeditions.

Pre-packed nano-expanders fill out this portable unit and graft it to an existing freighter, increasing its inventory capacity. Apply at your freighter's Upgrade Terminal.

title: Cargo Scan Deflector
description:
A specially tuned resonance jammer, designed to interfere with the remote cargo scans deployed by system authorities in the search for smuggled goods.

Deploy from the Quick Menu while a scan in progress to deflect the probe. Note: jamming is not 100% effective.

title: Cart Wheel
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Cement Bag
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Cement Mixer
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Chloroplast Membrane
description: Recharges Neural Assembly during daylight

title: Chloroplast Membrane Implant
description: Recharges Neural Assembly during daylight

description:
Upgrades the hyperdrive's core bounding magnets, preventing reality glitches when attempting to reach rare-class green stellar bodies.

User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems via the Galactic Map.

title: Circle-Patterned Rug
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Circles Hanging Lamp
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Colossus Geobay
description: An underground secure parking facility for the Colossus large Exocraft.

title: Coloured Light
description:
Coloured  Light is an item used in base building. There are six different varieties, all with the same blueprint formula:

* Cyan
* Green
* Magenta
* Red
* Yellow
* White

title: Combat Scope
description: A recoil-stabilising weapon scope for precise combat.

title: Communications Station
description: A terminal for the composition and transmission of messages to other travellers.

title: Composter
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Concrete Arch
description: A Concrete Arch for use in base construction.

title: Concrete Door Frame
description: A Concrete Door Frame for use in base construction.

title: Concrete Half Ramp
description: A Concrete Half Ramp for use in base construction.

title: Concrete Inner Roof Corner
description:
A vital structure roof piece, critical when building angular roofs.

Fashioned from reinforced concrete slabs.

title: Concrete Power Door
description:
A power-operated door. Can be connected to a power grid and operated using various switches.

Fashioned from reinforced concrete slabs.

title: Concrete Ramp
description: A Concrete Ramp for use in base construction.

title: Concrete Roof
description: A basic roof platform with reinforced load struts.

title: Concrete Roof Corner
description: A concrete roof corner for use in base construction.

title: Concrete Roof Panel
description: A piece of concrete roof panelling for use in base construction.

title: Concrete Triangle
description: A basic flooring piece of concrete construction, this simple shape allows the creation of a huge array of diverse structures.

title: Concrete Wall
description: A Concrete Wall for use in base construction.

title: Concrete Window Panel
description: A Concrete Window Panel for use in base construction.

title: Concrete-Framed Glass Panel
description: A glass floor/ceiling panel with a concrete frame.

title: Conflict Scanner
description: An upgrade to the starship's galactic-scale sensors. This device allows the user to access conflict data in the galaxy map, without having to put themselves in harm's way.

infobox.desc: Grants the ability to check a system's Conflict Level

title: Constructable Relic
description:
Constructable Relic are building recipes introduced in World Parts II. They can be discovered on Reliquary planets. Use the Visor and look for a Memory Stone. Interact with it to absorb ancient knowledge: It gives you a building blueprint or Nanites.

To build one relic in your base, you need the blueprint, 25 Magnetised Ferrite, and 25 Polished Stone harvested from Ruined Structures.

*Ruined Slab
*Ruined Monument
*Ruined Wall
*Ruined Totem
*Ruined Arch
*Ruined Gateway
*Ruined Statue
*Ruined Storehouse
*Ruined Dome
*Ruined Monolith
*Large Ruined Archway
* Ruined Column

title: Construction Research Unit
description:
Portable blueprint decryption device.

This field-deployable memory salvage module allows the user to convert Salvaged Data technology modules into advanced construction blueprints.

title: Construction Specialist's Room
description:
Integrated freighter research equipment tailored to the needs of construction overseers, and equipped with architectural and engineering design software.

This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.

title: Construction Terminal
description:
thumb|right|Construction terminal
A research station tailored to the needs of Construction Overseers, and equipped with architectural and engineering design software.

title: Corner Sofa
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Covered Brick Pile
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Cryogenic Chamber
description:
A low temperature chamber, designed to prevent the natural decay of organic matter.

Crafted from Living Glass and a Cryo-Pump.

title: Crystallised Heart
description:
The functional core of a Sentinel quadruped unit, but warped beyond all recognition. The entire machine is infested with a crystalline material that pulses wildy upon inspection.

A close analysis reveals the machinery itself appears to have been reconfigured, stretching and warping into a whole new form, writhing in the presence of these radiant shards of glass.

title: Cube
description: Basic structural buildable item.

title: Cuboid Inner Door
description: An inner door module used to divide cuboid rooms.

title: Cuboid Inner Wall
description: An inner wall module used to divide cuboid rooms.

title: Cuboid Roof Cap
description: Cuboid Roof Cap is a base building product designed for decorative use.

title: Cuboid Room Frame
description: Lightweight cuboid support structures which can be stacked or linked to form large industrial structures.

title: Curious Fauna Decal
description: Placeable decorative decals.

title: Curved Cuboid Roof
description: A curved, glass-fronted roof module that can be stacked or linked to form larger structures.

title: Curved Cuboid Wall
description: A curved, cuboid wall module that can be stacked or linked to form larger structures.

title: Curved Desk
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Curved Pipe
description: Basic structural buildable item.

title: Cyclonic Lathe
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Cyclotron Ballista
description:
thumb|right|Firing the ballista on an asteroid
A powerful ship-to-ship weapon, flinging plasmatic balls of ionising radiation towards the selected target. These projectiles can disable starship engines, leaving the target vulnerable to attack from other weapons.

These charged particles are extremely effective against starship shields, and considerably weaker against the metal armour of a ship's hull.

Use () to change weapon mode. Press () to fire.

title: Cyclotron Ballista Upgrade
description: Cyclotron Ballista Upgrades, contained within Cyclotron Modules, are procedurally generated upgrades granting bonuses to the starship's Cyclotron Ballista.

title: Cylinder
description: Basic structural buildable item.

title: Daedalus Engine
description:
A compact reactor unit, this engine is the heart of the Minotaur. It is mounted on a gyroscope to prevent fuel incidents during rapid movement.

Powered by conventional carbon-based fuels.

title: Daedalus Engine Upgrade
description: Daedalus Engine Upgrades, contained within Minotaur Engine Modules, are procedurally generated upgrades granting bonuses to a Minotaur's Daedalus Engine .

title: Damaged Component
description:
Damaged Component is a Points of Interest and fixing it allows access to the previously prevented function.
In case of the Multi-tool and the starship, the repair restores functionality to the slot where the Damaged Component used to be.

title: Decals
description: Placeable decorative decals.

title: Decommissioned Circuits
description:
A collection of salvaged circuitry.

Power generation economies go through vast numbers of high-tech components. As such, the demand is present even for highly damaged circuits, to be scavenged for parts or just plugged wholesale into low-quality power cores.

title: Deepwater Chamber
description: The core module for base construction, providing a generous central space on which to expand.

title: Defence Chit
description: A token, entitling the bearer to support from the system authorities in dealing with pirate attacks.

title: Defence Systems Upgrade
description: Defence Systems Upgrades, contained within upgrades granting bonuses to the exosuit's shield and health.

title: Deflector Shield
description:
Energy shield that protects spacecraft from laser fire, in-flight projectiles and accidental space debris interaction.

User is advised that catalytic elements are required to recharge device.

Operates automatically once constructed within user's starship inventory.

infobox.desc: Energy shield that protects spacecraft from laser fire, in-flight projectiles and accidental space debris interaction.

title: Deflector Shield Upgrade
description: Deflector Shield Upgrades, contained within Starship Shield Modules, are procedurally generated upgrades granting bonuses to the Deflector Shield of the starship.

title: Dish Receptor Antenna
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Draped Sail Timber Roof
description:
Reinforced Timber building module, widespread in basic structures across the galaxy.

Conforms to Universal Building Standards 2.3b, ensuring maximum compatibilty with other prefab structurs. Rapid Grid snapping allows for quick assembly of custom shelter layouts

title: Drawn Cart
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Dream Aerial
description:
A signal receiver and amplifier, tuned to the wavelength of the unconscious mind. It is every colour all at once, splitting the surrounding light into a shimmering rainbow.

Warning: Carrying this antenna into deep space may attract the attention of cosmic megafauna.

title: Dredging Laser
description:
Adds Terrain Manipulation capability to the laser systems of the Nautilon Submarine.

Cooled by specially designed water intakes, it is specifically calibrated to carve through complex geology of the sea floor.

title: Drift Suspension
description:
Overhauls Exocraft handling values through a combination of software tweaks, pressure adjustments and the insertion of microgravity wells into key suspension components.

Specifically tuned to increase the ability of the Exocraft to drift.

title: Drone Alert Poster
description: Self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

title: Dual-Pronged Antenna
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Economy Scanner
description: Grants the ability to check a system's economy without having to visit

infobox.desc: Grants the ability to check a system's economy without having to visit

title: Efficient Thrusters
description: Upgrades the starship launch systems, decreasing the fuel cost of takeoff.

title: Efficient Water Jets
description:
Improves the fuel efficiency of the jetpack's marine jets, reducing the drain on Exosuit life support system.

Aqueous compressor units are installed into the jetpack's turbines, bypassing the large energy requirements of underwater ignition.

title: Elaborate Alloy Roof
description:
Reinforced Alloy building module, widespread in basic structures across the galaxy.

Conforms to Universal Building Standards 2.3b, ensuring maximum compatibilty with other prefab structurs. Rapid Grid snapping allows for quick assembly of custom shelter layouts

title: Electrical Cloaking Unit
description:
Device to enable a wireless aesthetic in habitable bases.

Constructing the  Electrical Cloaking Unit within a powered base will reduce the visual prominence of all local Electrical Wiring. Hidden wires will continue to supply electricty, provided they are sufficiently powered.

title: Electrical Wiring
description:
High-capacity electrical wiring. Use wiring to connect Power generators to your base. Most technology as well as structures with embedded lighting systems, require a power source to operate.

Wiring can be connected to various switches to facilitate selective power flow.

title: Electromagnetic Generator
description:
When suitably placed in an area of high field strength, efficient electromagnetic dynamos are used to generate near limitless power.

Locate appropriate sites with the Surveying upgrade for the Analysis Visor. Power output will vary from site to site.

title: Emergency Signal Scanner
description:
A single-use receiver that scans for distress signals on freighter frequencies. Derelict or abandoned freighters often contain high-value salvage.

Select the Receiver and use Tune Signal (X/Xbox; 'E'/PC or File:PSBUTTON.SQUARE.png/PS4) to begin the location process.

title: Emergency Warp Unit
description:
A significant upgrade to the Hyperdrive that allows an instantaneous warp even while conventional systems are blocked by starship combat. Access to the emergency warp system is via the Quick Menu.

WARNING: Fast scramble systems mean the user is unable to plot a destination. Uncalculated lightspeed events will damage the unit and require frequent repairs.

title: Environment Control Unit
description:
A powerful environmental neutralising system is plugged directly into the Minotaur pilot when they take control of the vehicle. The system is powered via the Minotaur's main engine unit and requires no additional user inputs. Some minor pain may be noticed around the insertion site.

Renders the Minotaur pilot impervious to all environmental hazards.

title: Excavation Claw
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Exocraft Boosters
description: An efficient plasma injector coupled to the engine that allows short bursts of speed.

title: Exocraft Boosters Upgrade
description: Exocraft Boosters Upgrades, contained within Exocraft Boost Modules, are procedurally generated upgrades granting bonuses to the Exocraft's boosters.

infobox.image: NmsTech Exocraft Acceleration Module Upgrade Icon.png

title: Exocraft Mining Laser
description: A mining laser too cumbersome for handheld operation, they are found only installed on Exocraft.

title: Exocraft Mining Laser Upgrade
description: Exocraft Mining Laser Upgrades, contained within Exocraft Laser Modules, are procedurally generated upgrades granting bonuses to an Mining Laser.

title: Exocraft Radar
description:
A large and complex field-based subspace radar.

Due to their large power consumption and inherent subatomic instability, they are found only installed on Exocraft.

title: Exocraft Specialist's Room
description:
Integrated freighter research equipment tailored to the needs of exocraft mechanics, and equipped with bespoke vehicular design software.

This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.

title: Exocraft Summoning Unit
description:
A high-powered matter teleportation device, this personal translocator allows any connected Exocraft to be instantly transported to your location, from anywhere in the galaxy.

Interfaces with the Exosuit Quick Menu for ease of use.

title: Exosuit Upgrade Chart
description:
Encoded navigation data which, when properly decrypted, will reveal the location of a Drop Pod containing an Exosuit Inventory Upgrade.

Select the coordinates in the inventory and use Plot Route to pin the location in your Exosuit display.

title: Explosive Drones
description:
A temporary frigate upgrade that lasts for one expedition.

This pack of autonomous explosives have been programmed to launch from the fleet and pilot themselves directly towards hostile vessels. Extremely dangerous.

title: Exterior Catwalk
description:
This exterior wakway intelligently adjoins to existing freighter roons, creating decking outside the hull of large starships.

A Bulkhead Door must be installed to allow access to exterior spaces.

title: Exterior Platform
description:
An unsheltered observation deck. Allows the user to step outside the freighter hull, and gaze directly into the vastness of spaceThis exterior wakway intelligently adjoins to existing freighter roons, creating decking outside the hull of large starships.

A Bulkhead Door must be installed to allow access to exterior spaces.

description:
A portable data unit, compatible with most planetary fabricator facilities.

Once access has been gained to a central control terminal, the Override Unit can divert the facilities resources towards researching new product recipes.

description: Self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

title: Fleet Command Room
description:
Core Fleet Management Station. This advanced holographic communications station is vital for managing fleet expeditions from the comfort of your capital ship.

User is advised that a dedicated station is required to manage each fleet that will be sent on an expedition at a time, for example to have five simultaneous fleet expeditions, five of these terminal rooms will be required.

title: Flight Assist Override
description:
This grey-market electronics module disables critical safety and pilot-assistance modules usually baked into the starship's fly-by-wire control system. Despite its dubious legal status and its implication in a series of high-speed asteroid impacts, this module remains popular with smugglers, mercenaries, and others who think of themselves as advanced pilots.

Specifically tuned to increase the ability of the starship to drift during spaceflight.

title: Flight Path Poster
description: Self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

title: Floor Switch
description:
A power management device, the switch will toggle the flow of power when stood upon or otherwise activated.

Switches require both power and signal wires to control a device.

title: Folded Sail Alloy Roof
description:
Reinforced Alloy building module, widespread in basic structures across the galaxy.

Conforms to Universal Building Standards 2.3b, ensuring maximum compatibilty with other prefab structurs. Rapid Grid snapping allows for quick assembly of custom shelter layouts

description:

title: Forbidden Exosuit Module
description: Forbidden Exosuit Modules, contained within upgrades that grant various bonuses to your exosuit.

title: Forbidden Multi-Tool Module
description: Forbidden Multi-Tool Module, contained within upgrades granting various bonuses to your multi-tool.

title: Fossil Display
description:
A display stand designed to showcase the recovered remains of ancient lifeforms. Once placed, ancient bones can be arranged to re-create countless animal forms. A complete fossil requires a skull, a ribcage, two sets of limbs, and a tail.

Create a museum of assembled fossils at your base, or package your exhibits for trade on the open market, or with other Travellers. Find alien Fossil Collectors to trade with aboard Space Stations or at planetary Palaeontological Digs.

title: Fragment Supercharger
description:
Overhauls the firing mechanism of the Positron Ejector, resulting in faster, more accurate particles.

Improves range and accuracy.

title: Freighter Corridor
description:
This expansion module allows for the rapid construction of habitable spaces inside large starships.

Construction unit is fabricated complete with pressure bulkhead and all necessary attachment points.

title: Freighter Corridor (Endurance)
description:
This pressurised corridor intelligently adjoins to existing freighter rooms, connecting habitable spaces inside large starships.

This flexible corridor piece will automatically expand and contract to form curves or junctions when placed.

title: Freighter Cross Junction
description:
This expansion module allows for the rapid construction of habitable spaces inside large starships.

Construction unit is fabricated complete with pressure bulkhead and all necessary attachment points.

title: Freighter External Stairs
description:
A sturdy, non-slip staircase with an ergonomic incline, for traversing vertically between freighter decks.

These robust stairs can be affixed outside the freighter hull, creating connections between exterior catwalks and platforms.

title: Freighter Glass Corridor
description:
This pressurised corridor intelligently adjoins to existing freighter rooms, connecting habitable spaces inside large starships. The low-expansion, radiation-proof glass ceiling allows a view into deep space.

This flexible corridor piece will automatically expand and contract to form curves or junctions when placed.

title: Freighter Glass Stairs
description:
A sturdy, non-slip staircase with an ergonomic incline, for traversing vertically between freighter decks.

Constructed from low thermal expansion glass, these stairs provide the user with a thrilling view into deep space.

title: Freighter Hyperdrive
description:
FTL propulsion drive that allows starship to attain warp speed and jump between neighbouring systems.

Charge equipment with Warp Cell or Warp Hypercore.

title: Freighter Junction
description:
This expansion module allows for the rapid construction of habitable spaces inside large starships.

Construction unit is fabricated complete with pressure bulkhead and all necessary attachment points.

title: Freighter Stairs
description:
This expansion module allows for the rapid construction of habitable spaces inside large starships.

Construction unit is fabricated complete with pressure bulkhead and all necessary attachment points.

title: Freighter Stairs (Endurance)
description: A sturdy, non-slip staircase with an ergonomic incline, for traversing vertically between freighter decks.

title: Freighter Storage Unit
description:
Hybrid high-capacity storage unit / shelving module for installation in interstellar freighters.

Compatible with all standard life-support fittings.

title: Fuel Inverter
description: A piece of rechargeable power technology. The fuel inverter ensures an even flow of power to autonomous machines.

title: Fuel Oxidiser
description:
A temporary frigate upgrade that lasts for one expedition.

This powerful fuel upgrade overloads frigate engines, allowing for faster-than-usual travel.

title: Fusion Engine
description:
A compact fusion core common to all Exocraft.

Requires fuel to function.

title: Fusion Engine Upgrade
description: Fusion Engine Upgrades, contained within Exocraft Engine Modules, are procedurally generated upgrades granting bonuses to an Exocraft's Fusion Engine.

title: Fusion Ignitor
description:
A highly advanced piece of technology for use in the next generation of power plants. Producing a fusion core requires both intricate scientific skills and complex industrial processes.

Crafted from Portable Reactor, Quantum Processors and Geodesite.

title: Galactic Hub Decal
description:
thumb|Decal in use
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal depicts an emblem bearing the mission statement: "Explore Together'.

title: Galactic Trade Room
description:
Integrated freighter equipment providing instant local access to the galactic trade market for resources and commodities.

This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.

title: Galactic Trade Terminal
description: A trading terminal that provides instant local access to the market for resources and products.

infobox.desc: Electronic access to the galactic markets

title: Gas Canister
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Gas Extractor
description: An automated gas harvester. Identify a Surveying upgrade for the Supply Depots with Supply Pipes to allow collection from more convenient sites.

title: Gek Decal
description: Placeable decorative decals.

title: Gek Hypnosis Poster
description: Self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

title: Generator Coupling
description: The generator coupling is an important piece of the machine's rechargeable power systems. Without it, the generator would fruitlessly spin, pumping power out into the void.

title: Geodesite
description: Geodesite is a tradeable that is used for crafting.

title: Geology Cannon Upgrade
description: Geology Cannon Upgrades, contained within Geology Cannon Modules, are procedurally generated upgrades granting bonuses to a Multi-tool's Geology Cannon.

title: Glass
description:
Shatter-proof, scratch-resistant glass with a self-cleaning, UV-cured coating, for general construction use.

Refined from Silicate powder. Extract silicate from the earth with a Terrain Manipulator.

Can be crafted from Frost Crystals extracted from plants on frozen worlds.

title: Glass Tunnel
description:
Pressurised, reinforced glass tunnels for deep-sea construction.

Advanced nano-mineral coating ensures high performance at depth, without compromising visibility.

title: Golden Counter
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Golden Counter Corner
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Golden Gek Poster
description: Self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

title: Golden Half Counter
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Golden Table
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Grantine
description:
Soft workable alloy favored by artisans throughout the known galaxy. Crafted from Ionised Cobalt and Dioxite.

A popular trading good, with many galactic shipping paths devoted to its sale and transport.

title: Green Design Decal
description: Placeable decorative decals.

title: Grip Boost Suspension
description:
Overhauls Exocraft handling values through a combination of software tweaks, pressure adjustments and the insertion of microgravity wells into key suspension components.

Specifically tuned to increase the ability of the Exocraft to turn sharply.

title: H-Beam Stack
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Hand of Approval Decal
description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal depicts a universal hand gesture signifying approval.

title: Handful of Cogs
description: A valuable piece of broken down Trade Terminal.

title: Hanging Flag 1
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Hanging Flag 2
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Hanging Lamp
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Hardframe Body
description:
A collection of salvaged components from a Sentinel Hardframe, reconditioned to fit the Minotaur Heavy Exocraft Hybrid.

Will function as a semi-autonomous artificial pilot plugin. Installation allows the Minotaur to traverse planets itself and engage in combat or mining activities to support its primary operator.

The AI pilot will always cede control to the primary operator when they enter the cockpit.

title: Hardframe Left Arm
description:
A collection of salvaged components from a Sentinel Hardframe, reconditioned to fit the Minotaur Heavy Exocraft Hybrid.

When installed alongside a Minotaur Laser, it transforms the mining laser into a powerful combat upgrade with the ability to deal heavy damage to stunned entities.

infobox.stats:
Mining Laser Power: +62%
Damage to stunned entities: +400%
Post-Impact Ignition: Enabled
Impact Fire Duration: 4 seconds

title: Hardframe Legs
description:
A collection of salvaged components from a Sentinel Hardframe, reconditioned to fit the Minotaur Heavy Exocraft Hybrid.

Installation will significantly improve the Minotaur's engine and mobility systems.

title: Hardframe Right Arm
description:
A collection of salvaged components from a Sentinel Hardframe, reconditioned to fit the Minotaur Heavy Exocraft Hybrid.

This limb override also functions as its own dedicated combat system. It deploys high-velocity stun projectiles and serves as an excellent support weapon to the Minotaur's primary cannon.

Use <weapon select key> to cycle available weapon modes.

title: Hazard Protection
description: The sodium-based substances. User is advised that a failure to charge the Hazard Protection system may allow their environment to become incompatible with life.

infobox.desc: Basic shielding of user from environmental hazards.

title: Health Station
description: A wall mounted module that can be used to recharge health.

title: Hermetic Seal
description:
A high-performance carbon seal, able to withstand both the harsh interstellar environment and the rigours of intensive, high-energy industrial use.

User is advised to regularly check seal integrity after installation.

title: Herox
description:
Combined neutral alloy with uses that range from pharmacology all the way to heavy industry. Crafted from Ionised Cobalt and Ammonia.

Forms the backbone of galactic alloy trading.

title: Hi-Slide Suspension
description:
Overhauls Exocraft handling values through a combination of software tweaks, pressure adjustments and the insertion of microgravity wells into key suspension components.

Specifically tuned to increase the ability of the Exocraft to slide.

title: High-Power Sonar
description: A high-detail sonar device, capable of upgrading the scanner technology aboard a submarine to Analysis Visor levels.

title: Holo-Door
description: An elegant holographic door which allows quick access to any structure while regulating the temperature and toxicity of the interior.

title: Horizontal Alloy Window
description:
Reinforced Alloy building module, widespread in basic structures across the galaxy.

Conforms to Universal Building Standards 2.3b, ensuring maximum compatibilty with other prefab structurs. Rapid Grid snapping allows for quick assembly of custom shelter layouts

title: Horizontal Timber Window
description:
Reinforced Timber building module, widespread in basic structures across the galaxy.

Conforms to Universal Building Standards 2.3b, ensuring maximum compatibilty with other prefab structurs. Rapid Grid snapping allows for quick assembly of custom shelter layouts

title: Humboldt Drive
description:
A thermally-efficient, inversion-proof reactor engine capable of powering the Nautilon even at extreme depths.

Powered by Hydrothermal Fuel Cells.

title: Humboldt Drive Upgrade
description: Humboldt Drive Upgrades, contained within Humboldt Drive Modules, are procedurally generated upgrades granting bonuses to a Nautilon Exocraft's Humboldt Drive.

title: Hydraulic Wiring
description:
Specialist wiring and control threads, this flexible material allows the transmission of power and signals, as well as offering direct manipulation of remote components.

Used in the creation of a wide range of advanced technologies.

title: Hyperdrive
description:
FTL propulsion drive that allows starship to attain warp speed and jump between neighbouring systems.

User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems through Galactic Map.

infobox.desc: FTL propulsion drive for warp speed

title: Hyperdrive (Atlas)
description: FTL propulsion drive that allows starships to attain warp speed and travel between neighbouring star systems. User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems through Galactic Map.

infobox.desc: FTL propulsion drive for warp speed

title: Hyperdrive Upgrade
description: Hyperdrive Upgrades, contained within Hyperdrive Modules, are upgrades granting bonuses to the Hyperdrive of a Starship.

title: Hyperdrive technology
description: Hyperdrive is not provided with the original Life Pod systems, so will require crafting with the proper blueprints and resources. Videos of gameplay indicate that at least one type of hyperdrive can be crafted with a combination of Silicon and Iridium. The Alpha Vector starship (PS4 pre-orders) and the Horizon Omega starship (PC pre-orders) will both contain hyperdrive technology.

title: Icarus Fuel System
description: The Icarus system takes advantage of existing metal panelling, upgrading them into photovoltaic surfaces. This reactive coating generates energy during daylight hours, offsetting fuel consumption.

title: Ideal Tech Synergies
description: Ideal Tech Synergies is a guide page with infographics illustrating ideal tech synergies, as validated by The Alchemist (otherwise known as

title: Illegal Hazard Protection Upgrade
description: Illegal Hazard Protection Upgrades, contained within Suspicious Hazard Protection Modules, are procedurally generated upgrades granting various hazard bonuses to your exosuit.

title: Illuminated Sign
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Impact Igniter
description:
A powerful combat upgrade for the Pulse Spitter. This module installs series of delicately calibrated fuel-injection nozzles within the fireing chamber, which are used to initiate a controlled burn within its plasma projectiles

Causes targets hit by the Pulse Spitter to burn for a short while, causing additional damage.

title: Industrial Pump
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Infra-Knife Accelerator Upgrade
description: Infra-Knife Accelerator Upgrades, contained within Infra-Knife Modules, are procedurally generated upgrades granting bonuses to the starship's Infra-Knife Accelerator.

title: Infrastructure Ladder
description: A ladder used in conjunction with Structural Platforms to allow the user to reach great heights with ease.

title: Instability Drive
description:
A highly advanced upgrade for the Pulse Engine, vastly increasing fuel efficiency.

Tritium supplies are redirected into a cycle of miniature black holes. Resulting micro-gravity fluctuations are harnessed to boost starship propulsion beyond conventional combustion-based approaches.

title: Insulated Flask
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Interior Stairs
description: A set of stairs to improve access inside cuboid structures.

title: Internal Freighter Wall
description: An interior wall to subdivide large freighter spaces. Seamlessly configures itself to fit the aesthetics of the surrounding room

title: Interstellar Scanner
description:
An upgrade to the freighter's galactic-scale sensors.

This device allows the user to access detailed economic and conflict data for a system, even without having previously visited.

title: Ion Battery
description:
Convenient and optimised power storage unit. Used in a wide variety of defensive and hazard protection systems.

Constructed by fusing Ferrite Dust with underground Cobalt. Frequently found ready-made in cylindrical metal containers.

title: Ion Capacitor
description:
A reinforced crate of ion capacitors.

These supercapacitors have an incredibly high energy density. In great demand in power generation economies.

title: Irregular Alloy Window
description:
Reinforced Alloy building module, widespread in basic structures across the galaxy.

Conforms to Universal Building Standards 2.3b, ensuring maximum compatibilty with other prefab structurs. Rapid Grid snapping allows for quick assembly of custom shelter layouts

title: Jetpack
description:
Provides the Exosuit with advanced movement capabilities, including temporary flight.

Control thrust with 25px|link=https://nomanssky.gamepedia.com/File:PSBUTTON.X.png/45px|link=https://nomanssky.gamepedia.com/File:Keywide.space.png/25px|link=https://nomanssky.gamepedia.com/File:XBOXBUTTON.A.png (PS4/PC/Xbox). The flightpack uses energy from the Exosuit Life Support system to pressurise and vent bursts of gas, propelling the user into the air.

Jetpack can be temporarily overloaded by gathering Deuterium-rich plants, causing a dramatic increase in available thrust for ten (10) seconds. Consuming a specific cooked product such as Bread will give eight (8) seconds of free thrust per unit.

infobox.desc: Used as a flight pack to temporarily render the user airborne.

description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

Attaches directly to corridors.

thumb|Landing Pad attached to a base
A stable, reinforced landing pad for starships.
