description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Large Wedge
description: Basic structural buildable item.

title: Launch Auto-Charger
description:
Photovoltaic panels fitted to the starship Launch Thrusters allow for a slow trickle charge while the ship is not in operation.

Harvested light is used to fuse di-hydrogen from the atmosphere and over time will refuel the Launch Thrusters automatically.

title: Launch Thruster Upgrade
description: Launch Thruster Upgrades, contained within Launch Thruster Modules, are upgrades granting bonuses to a Starship's Launch Thruster.

title: Lemmium
description:
Pure Ferrite alloy. Crafted from Pure Ferrite and Uranium. 

Used extensively in starship freighter construction due to its sheer strength. A hardcore material popular on the Galactic Trade Network.

title: Life Support Upgrade
description: Life Support Upgrades, contained within Life Support Modules, are procedurally generated upgrades granting bonuses to Life Support.

title: Light
description: A low energy consumption light, with an extended lifespan and fully recyclable components.

title: Liquidator Body
description:
An upgrade to the Minotaur Heavy Exocraft Hybrid, the Liquidator is a cutting-edge heavy duty combat unit, designed to operate in the harshest of environments.

Will function as a semi-autonomous artificial pilot plugin. Installation allows the Minotaur to traverse planets itself and engage in combat or mining activities to support its primary operator.

The AI pilot will always cede control to the primary operator when they enter the cockpit.

infobox.stats: Allows the Minotaur to assist the player in combat when not in use

title: Liquidator Right Arm
description:
An upgrade to the Minotaur Heavy Exocraft Hybrid, the Liquidator is a cutting-edge heavy-duty combat unit designed to operate in the harshest of environments.

This limb override also functions as its own dedicated combat system - a flamethrower for extreme damage at close range.

title: Living Glass
description:
An advanced building material, this glass has been imbued with organic compounds that allow it to react to the environment. Microbes within the glass filter harmful light of all wavelengths and balance the atmosphere as required.

Crafted from Lubricant and Glass.

title: Lost Angler's Rig
description:
A versatile piece of angling equipment, enabling the user to fish in a variety of conditions. This rig was once owned by the legendary Lost Angler

Access the fishing rig by pressing 20px/20px/20px (PS4/PC/Xbox) and cast your line into a body of water with 40px/20px/40px. With a fish hooked, press and hold 40px/20px/40px to haul in your catch.

infobox.desc: A versatile piece of angling equipment, enabling the user to fish in a variety of water conditions.

title: Lubricant
description:
A synthetic lubricant that reduces wear and prolongs the lifespan of technologies with moving parts.

Crafted from Faecium and Gamma Root.

title: Magnetic Resonator
description:
An electromagnetic frequency oscillator, able to function in a wide-range of conditions thanks to both ferrous and non-ferrous magnetic properties.

Used in the creation of a wide range of advanced technologies.

title: Magno-Gold
description:
Highly prized and lustrous alloy. Popular with traders of all known primary galactic races. Crafted from Ionised Cobalt and Phosphorus.

Easily recognisable by its bright red glow and strong magnetic field.

title: Marine Shelter
description:
An emergency survival module.

Can be rapidly deployed on the seabed in the event of an oxygen or other Exosuit life support emergency. Provides temporary shelter from environmental hazards, predators and other hostiles forces found in the deep ocean.

title: Mark of the Denier
description:
A tiny mote of stardust, no more than a speck. On closer examination, its surface is all crystalline shards and distorted crimson geometry.

It flickers with pent-up energy, demanding to be free.

Empower the mark as you discover systems, planets and objects across the universe.

title: Matter Beam
description:
A device that modulates standard freighter communication signals to enable the interplanetary transport of matter as well as data.

Freighters fitted with such a device can send and receive products and substances to a user's Exo-suit over a long distance.

title: Memory Fragment
description:
The shattered remnants of an expired traveller. It whispers, an unknowable name deep within its fibres.

The memory will manifest as an important technology upgrade to aid you on your travels. Absorb this memory with 20px/25px/25px (PC/PS/XB).

title: Memory Resonator
description: A highly familiar, entirely novel, piece of technology, designed by 20px/25px/25px (PC/PS/XB).

title: Message Module
description: A small and accessible information container for leaving messages or viewing left messages and short strings of information.

title: Metal Arch
description: A Metal Arch for use in base construction.

title: Metal Door Frame
description: A Metal Door Frame for use in base construction.

title: Metal Doorway
description: A thin metal doorway for use in base construction.

title: Metal Floor Panel
description: A Metal Floor Panel for use in base construction.

title: Metal Frontage
description: A Metal Frontage for use in base construction.

title: Metal Half Arch
description: A Metal Half Arch for use in base construction.

title: Metal Half Ramp
description: A Metal Half Ramp for use in base construction.

title: Metal Inner Roof Corner
description: A basic flooring piece of metal construction, this simple shape allows the creation of a huge array of diverse structures.

title: Metal Plating
description:
A lightweight metal product, heavily used in the manufacture of starship parts and deployable technology. A mainstay of the construction industries of all known primary species.

Crafted from Ferrite Dust.

title: Metal Power Door
description:
A power-operated door. Can be connected to a power grid and operated using various switches.

Fashioned from high-strength metal alloys.

title: Metal Ramp
description: A Metal Ramp for use in base construction.

title: Metal Roof
description: A basic roof platform with reinforced load struts.

title: Metal Roof Corner
description: A metal roof corner for use in base construction.

title: Metal Roof Panel
description: A piece of metal roof panelling for use in base construction.

title: Metal Triangle
description: A basic flooring piece of metal construction, this simple shape allows the creation of a huge array of diverse structures.

title: Metal Wall
description: A Metal Wall for use in base construction.

title: Metal Window Panel
description: A Metal Window Panel for use in base construction.

title: Metal-Framed Glass Panel
description: A glass floor/ceiling panel with a metal frame.

title: Meteorological Spinner
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Microprocessor
description:
A compact, low-heat microchip. Assembled from processed Chromatic Metal, created from one of several specialised terrain metals.

Used in the creation of a wide range of advanced technologies.

title: Mind Ark
description: A strange piece of technology, a gift from beyond the stars. It shimmers in a way that suggests it is not fully in this world.

title: Mind Control Device
description:
A temporary frigate upgrade that lasts for one expedition.

The mind control device plugs into the ship's trading and communications systems, allowing the Fleet Commander to gain the upper hand in any negotiation.

title: Mineral Compressor
description:
A temporary frigate upgrade that lasts for one expedition.

The mineral compressor allows fleet mining crews to liquidise the substances they extract, for both faster processing and easier transportation.

title: Mineral Extractor
description:
An automated mineral harvester. Determine a Deep-Level Mineral Deposit site with the Surveying upgrade for the Analysis Visor. Mineral extraction rates and produced minerals will vary from site to site.

Requires power to function. Connect to Supply Depots with Supply Pipes to allow collection from more convenient sites.

title: Mineral Processing Rig
description:
A large and powerful refiner unit, designed to be housed within the belly of a Colossus Exocraft.

The unit is able to process the most complex recipes, but requires its own independent fuel source.

title: Mini Weathered Hanging
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Mining Beam Upgrade
description: Mining Beam Upgrades, contained within Mining Beam Modules, are procedurally generated upgrades granting bonuses to the Multi-tool's Mining Beam.

title: Minotaur AI Pilot
description:
A semi-autonomous artificial pilot plugin for the Minotaur Heavy Exocraft Hybrid. Installation allows the Minotaur to traverse planets itself and engage in combat or mining activities to support its primary operator.

The AI pilot will always cede control to the primary operator when they enter the cockpit.

Piloting routines are highly localised. It is incapable of developing emotional bonds nor exercising independent control of the Minotaur.

title: Minotaur Bore
description:
Adds Terrain Manipulation capability to the laser array of the Minotaur Heavy Exosuit Hybrid.

A special mount allows the rapid deployment of a high-energy terrain excavator, without clogging the Minotaur's delicate joints and servos with dirt.

title: Minotaur Cannon
description:
A mounted cannon specifically designed for the Minotaur Heavy Exosuit Hybrid.

Designed primarily for damage against biological entities and inefficient when deployed as a mining device.

title: Minotaur Cannon Upgrade
description: Minotaur Cannon Upgrades, contained within Minotaur Cannon Modules, are procedurally generated upgrades granting bonuses to a Minotaur's Minotaur Cannon .

title: Minotaur Flamethrower Upgrade
description: Minotaur Flamethrower Upgrades, contained within Minotaur Flamethrower Modules, are procedurally generated upgrades granting bonuses to a Minotaur's Liquidator Right Arm .

title: Minotaur Geobay
description:
A secure parking, summoning and customisation facility for the Minotaur Heavy Exosuit Hybrid.

Deploy the Minotaur from the Quick Menu. With the aid of an Orbital Exocraft Materialiser mounted inside a freighter, the Minotaur can be instantly deployed to any location within the same system as the mothership.

title: Minotaur Laser
description:
A mounted laser system specifically designed for the Minotaur Heavy Exosuit Hybrid.

Enables conventional mining operations. Ineffective in combat scenarios.

title: Minotaur Laser Upgrade
description: Minotaur Laser Upgrades, contained within Minotaur Laser Modules, are procedurally generated upgrades granting bonuses to a Minotaur's Minotaur Laser .

title: Minotaur Radar Array
description:
A high-detail radar device, capable of upgrading the scanner technology aboard the Minotaur to Analysis Visor levels.

Press File:Key.c.png to activate a radar sweep, revealing additional points of interest that cannot be located via a Multi-tool scanner.

Use the Quick Menu to tune the radar to specific buildings.

title: Moon Pool Floor
description:
A holographic moon pool hatch. Allows easy access into and out of aquatic environments.

Pressurisation systems are automatically and discreetly hidden around the room.

title: Moulded Crate
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Moulded Lockbox
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Mounted Cannon
description: Due to energy requirements of this powerful weapon, they can only be fired from an Exocraft mount.

title: Mounted Cannon Upgrade
description: Mounted Cannon Upgrade, contained within Exocraft Cannon Modules, are procedurally generated upgrades granting bonuses to an Mounted Cannon. They were introduced into the game in Update 1.63.

title: Mounted Flamethrower
description:
A mounted flamethrower specifically designed for the Exocraft.
Causes Extreme damage at close range Use G to cycle through available weapon modes

title: Movement System Upgrade
description: Movement System Upgrades, contained within Movement Modules, are procedurally generated upgrades granting bonuses to the movement functions of the Exosuit.

title: Multi-Tool Expansion Slot
description: A flexible upgrade circuit, compatible with all person

title: Multi-Tool Upgrades
description: The multi-tool is the hand-held multipurpose tool / gun that the player is given in No Man's Sky. The following upgrades are available:

title: Multi-Tool Upgrades (Atlas)
description: The multi-tool is the hand-held multipurpose tool / gun that the player is given in No Man's Sky. The following upgrades are available:

title: Myth Beacon
description:
The result of Nada's research into unusual patterns detected in the stories of the Gek, Korvax, and Vy'keen.

The beacon broadcasts a signal echo attuned to the shift historiographical flux mapped by Nada's traveller companions.

Specialist Polo is unwilling to predict the results of the broadcast.

title: Nada Decal
description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal depicts the Korvax Priest Entity Nada.

title: Nautilon Cannon Upgrade
description: Nautilon Cannon Upgrades, contained within Nautilon Cannon Modules, are procedurally generated upgrades granting bonuses to a Nautilon Exocraft's Nautilon Cannon.

title: Neural Shielding
description: Blocks hostile cargo probes

title: Neural Shielding Implant
description: Blocks hostile cargo probes

title: Neural Stimulator
description: Increases the capacity of the Exosuit's Jetpack Tanks and Adrenal Pump Reserves, allowing the user to both fly and sprint longer.

infobox.stats:
+20% Jetpack Tanks
+10% Sprint Distance
+11% Recharge Rate
+21% Sprint Recovery Time

title: Neutron Cannon
description:
A high-energy weapon attachment for the Multi-Tool. The Neutron Cannon energises atmospheric particles before propelling them towards hostile targets, delivering significant area damage.

Access fire mode by pressing <weapon select key>. Charge the weapon with <fire key>, then release to unleash a volley of ionised particles.

While the cannon can deliver instantaneous single shots, longer charges will result in significant increases to the speed and volume of released particles.

infobox.desc: The Neutron Cannon is a charged energy weapon.

title: Neutron Cannon Upgrade
description: Neutron Cannon Upgrades, contained within Neutron Cannon Modules, are procedurally generated upgrades granting bonuses to the Neutron Cannon.

title: Neutron Shielding
description:
Highly-efficient control materials are inserted into the frame of the Exocraft, neutralising dangerous incoming energy waves.

Entirely prevents all damage or energy drain while inside an Exocraft in radioactive environments.

title: Night Crystals
description:
Naturally glowing crystalline clusters.

Used in the creation of technological devices and starship manufacture.

title: Nomad Geobay
description: An underground secure parking facility for the Nomad light Exocraft.

title: Null Decal
description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal depicts the Traveller Null.

title: Nutrient Ingestor
description:
The nutrient ingestor improves exosuit performance via the automatic portioning and processing of various cooked items.

Select Begin Ingestion to commence automatic consumption of supplied ingredients.

title: Obsolete Technology
description:
A piece of technology, corrupted by interference from the Atlas.

Can be recycled for usable components.

title: Oil Burner
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Once-Useful Springs
description: A valuable piece of broken down Trade Terminal.

title: Open Moulded Lockbox
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Open Tall Moulded Lockbox
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Optical Drill
description:
Wafer-thin lens arrays are arranged in a highly calibrated matrix, focusing the Mining Beam on an atomic level.

This extra precision allows for highly efficient mining. Elements are extracted more efficiently, increasing the yield from items harvested with the Multi-Tool.

title: Opulent Tapestry
description: An attractive silk wall hanging, richly dyed and adorned with web-thin strands of gold and cadmium. Lends the impression of opulence to any room.

title: Orbital Exocraft Materialiser
description:
Advanced integrated freighter equipment. Construction allows the user to summon any owned Exocraft while in the same system as their freighter. This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.

Interfaces with the Exosuit Quick Command Menu for ease of use.

title: Ornate Stool
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Osmotic Generator
description:
Installed into the drive system aboard the Nautilon Submarine.

Captures energy by exploiting the saline gradient in deep water environments, allowing a slow recharge of the Humboldt Drive in the event of fuel emergencies.

title: P-Field Compressor
description:
A powerful upgrade to the Neutron Cannon. Additional resonance compressors allow significantly more energy to be routed through the cannon's central core, dramatically increasing operating power.

Installation will allow a fully-charged Neutron Cannon to launch additional projectiles at higher speeds.

title: Pail
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Panelled Timber Divider
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Paralysis Mortar
description:
Non-violent projectile weapon. Launched projectiles will incapacitate nearby targets with a burst of electrical energy. Effective against both biological and electronic entities.

Charged with Unstable Plasma. 

Press [secondary weapon fire control] to activate.

title: Pawprints Poster
description: Self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

title: Personal Forcefield
description:
On activation, this module draws power from Exosuit Life Support systems to overload the Multi-Tool, distorting the electromagnetic field around the user and creating a powerful personal shield.

While this field offers substantial protection against incoming laser fire, the user is advised that the Multi-Tool cannot be used for other functions while powering the shield.

title: Personal Refiner
description:
A compact extension to the Exosuit, installing a small Portable Refiner, accessible directly from the user's Exosuit interface.

Unit requires fuel and is limited to refining one substance at a time.

title: Personal Refiner Mk 2
description:
A compact extension to the Exosuit, installing an advanced yet portable Medium Refiner, accessible directly from the user's Exosuit interface.

Unit requires fuel and is able to refine more complex recipes than the standard personal refiner unit.

title: Phase Beam Upgrade
description: Phase Beam Upgrades, contained within Phase Beam Modules, are procedurally generated upgrades granting bonuses to the starship's Phase Beam.

title: Photon Cannon Upgrade
description: Photon Cannon Upgrades, contained within Photon Cannon Modules, are procedurally generated upgrades granting bonuses to the starship's Photon Cannon.

title: Photonix Core
description: Provides increased manoeuvrability and longer boosts during spaceflight.

title: Pilgrim Geobay
description: An underground secure parking facility for the Pilgrim light Exocraft.

title: Pipe
description: Basic structural buildable item.

title: Planetary Globe
description: A holographic representation of a world, mappable to any known galactic coordinates to simulate local planetary data. Generates an impression of scholarly intelligence when furnishing office environments.

title: Plasma Launcher
description:
High-impact projectile weapon. Launched plasma shells bounce off surfaces until their internal timer triggers a large explosion.

Charged with Unstable Plasma. Careless use can result in damage to user.

Press [secondary weapon fire control] to activate.

title: Plasma Launcher Upgrade
description: Plasma Launcher Upgrades, contained within Plasma Launcher Modules, are procedurally generated upgrades granting bonuses to a Multi-tool's Plasma Launcher.

title: Plasmatic Warp Injector
description:
An augmentation for the colossal hyperdrive engine of an interstellar freighter.

Hyperdrive benefits from advanced fusion that brings starship to higher warp speed and intensity. User's craft will become able to leap deeper into space, and into more distant planetary systems.

title: Polo Decal
description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal depicts Gek Specialist Polo.

title: Poly Fibre
description:
A connective fibre for electronics, made from an advanced synthetic polymer and capable of serving as a conduit for power and data.

Crafted from Cactus Flesh and Star Bulbs.

title: Polyphonic Core
description:
An attachment for the Multi-Tool Scanner that allows the device to detect and decode the cloaking signal of nearby Autophage units.

Use (20px/40px/40px) (PC/PS/XB) to activate the Scanner. As its detector waveform passes over the local area, it will automatically reveal any nearby Autophage entities.

In addition, this device can be used to locate Autophage settlements. Use Locate Autophage Camp to pinpoint a planetary gathering of Autophage.

infobox.desc: Reveals Autophage camps, NPCs, and sentience echoes.

title: Portable Reactor
description:
A miniature self-controlled nuclear reactor. Generates sub-stellar levels of energy in a hassle-free, widely compatible fuel module.

Crafted from Liquid Explosives and Fusion Accelerant.

title: Positron Ejector
description:
A powerful starship weapon, capable of delivering extreme destruction at close range.

Note: these particles show decreased effectiveness against shielded targets.

Use () to change weapon mode. Press () to fire.

title: Positron Ejector (Atlas)
description: Shots are granted a wide cone of destruction. With reduced range and rate of fire, users are encouraged to engage their targets in close proximity.

infobox.desc: Shots are granted a wide cone of destruction.

title: Positron Ejector Upgrade
description: Positron Ejector Upgrades, contained within Positron Modules, are upgrades granting bonuses to the starship's Positron Ejector.

title: Power Inverter
description:
A power management device, the switch will toggle the flow of power when used.

Switches require both power and signal wires to control a device.

title: Precision Minotaur Laser
description:
An upgrade for the Minotaur Heavy Exosuit Hybrid's laser array system.

Amplifies the power deployed by the mining beam, increasing mining speed and enabling the processing of difficult to mine raw materials.

title: Pressure Membrane
description:
Extreme pressure environments - such as deep water - cause elevated stress on the Exosuit's oxygen circulation and general life support systems.

Installation of this reinforced pressurisation shell increases efficiency and protection while operating in high-pressure environments.

title: Projectile Ammunition
description:
Advanced munition fragments, constructed to fit Universal Multi-Tool Standard 07/FF1.

Easily inserted into the Boltcaster, Pulse Spitter and Scatter Blaster via the Multi-Tool clip reloading system.

title: Propped Flag Divider
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Propped Timber Divider
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Propped Timber Dividers
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Proximity Switch
description:
A power management device, the switch will toggle the flow of power when an entity is detected nearby.

Switches require both power and signal wires to control a device.

title: Pulse Engine
description:
The Pulse Engine is the part of the ship's propulsion system which powers all in-system flights, including travel between planets or moons within the same star system.

The Pulse Engine enables three states of starship travel: standard flight, with speed controllable using the forward and backward inputs; boosted flight, accelerated standard flight with reduced maneuverability; and Pulse Jump, in-system fast travel which disables turning entirely and draws from the Pulse Engine's fuel supply. The fuel tank of the Pulse Engine is sufficient for approximately 3 minutes of Pulse Jump time, during which an un-upgraded starship will travel approximately 4,000ks (4,000 thousand units distance)

The Pulse Engine's fuel supply is charged with Tritium (0.5%/unit) or Pyrite (2.5%/unit), so it's recommended to keep a supply of either one on board to recharge during a Pulse Jump. While in space, Tritium can be mined from asteroids. Note that Pulse Engine charge is only used during a Pulse Jump, and not for normal boosting.

If Pulse Engine is damaged by rough handling or enemy fire, the starship will be unable to fly until the technology is repaired using a Hermetic Seal and Carbon Nanotubes.

infobox.desc: Spaceflight propulsion, boosts and on-demand Pulse Jumps through local system.

title: Pulse Engine Upgrade
description: Pulse Engine Upgrades, contained within Pulse Engine Modules, are procedurally generated upgrades granting bonuses to the in-system movement of a Starship.

title: Pulse Spitter
description:
Specialist rapid-fire weapon attachment for the Multi-Tool. Access fire mode by pressing [Triangle/G] and fire weapon with [Left Mouse Button].

The Pulse Spitter redirects Multi-Tool optics to ionise inserted Metallic Elements. These projectiles are launched in a rapid-fire spread, bombarding potential targets with a wave of high-energy plasma.

infobox.desc: The Pulse Spitter releases short, rapid sequences of fire.

title: Pulse Spitter (Atlas)
description:
The Pulse Spitter releases short, rapid sequences of fire.

User is advised to discharge full bursts on target if total lifeform destruction is required.

infobox.desc: The Pulse Spitter releases short, rapid sequences of fire.

title: Pulse Spitter Upgrade
description: Pulse Spitter Upgrades, contained within Pulse Spitter Modules, are procedurally generated upgrades granting bonuses to a Multi-tool's Pulse Spitter.

title: Pyramid
description: Basic structural buildable item.

title: Q-Resonator
description: Upgrades the Infra Knife Accelerator, compressing internal waveforms to allow an extra shot to be weaved in to the conventional fire patterns.

title: Qitanian Empire Decal
description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal represents the Qitanian Empire, and the spirit of charity, kindness, peace and reason.

title: Quad Flag Divider
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Quantum Accelerator
description:
Several large quantum accelerator units.

Capable of propelling matter at unmeasurable speeds, these units are particularly important in power generation economies, where they're used to compress the energy stored in high-grade batteries.

title: Quantum Computer
description:
An extremely fast advanced processing unit. Allows real-time solving of otherwise impossible calculations. However, protection against decoherence is not guaranteed.

Used in the creation of a wide range of advanced technologies.

title: Quantum Processor
description:
A highly advanced computational device, essential for the complex calculations involved in warp travel.

Crafted from Circuit Boards and Superconductors.

title: Radar Amplifier
description: Allows for additional building types to be acquired by the Exocraft Radar.

title: Radar Power Resonator
description: Allows for additional building types to be acquired by the Exocraft Radar.

title: Radiant Brain
description: Shifting nanite clusters sewn together with a Messenger of the Atlas.

title: Radiant Shard
description:
A fragment of glassy lifeforce, chipped from a larger formation. Dynamic intermolecular binding gives the shard a strangely flexible, sinewy quality. It writhes gently, almost as if it were seeking something...

Highly sought after for salvage operations, as it can be used to bypass the security systems of key Sentinel ship technologies.

title: Radiation Protection Module
description: Increase the base capacity of the Hazard Protection system, allowing the user to spend longer in radioactive environments without requiring a recharge of the traveller's  Hazard Protection Unit in the Exosuit.

title: Radiation Protection Upgrade
description: Radiation Protection Upgrades, contained within Radiation Protection Modules, are upgrades granting supplementary protection against radiation.

title: Raised Platform Alloy Roof
description:
Reinforced Alloy building module, widespread in basic structures across the galaxy.

Conforms to Universal Building Standards 2.3b, ensuring maximum compatibilty with other prefab structurs. Rapid Grid snapping allows for quick assembly of custom shelter layouts

title: Reality De-Threader
description:
An augmentation for the colossal hyperdrive engine of an interstellar freighter.

Uncapped, yet stabilised, fusion systems are threaded into user's hyperdrive. Allows starship to jump ever longer distances in deep space.

title: Rebuilt Exosuit Module
description: A salvaged upgrade for the Exosuit. Use (

title: Recycled Circuitry
description: A valuable piece of broken down Trade Terminal.

title: Red Design Decal
description: Placeable decorative decals.

title: Refiner Room
description:
Vital integrated freighter equipment. The Freighter Refiner allows three different substances to be processed into more powerful and more advanced materials.

This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.

title: Reinforced Capsule
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Reinforced Piping
description: A valuable piece of broken down Trade Terminal.

title: Reinforced Window
description:
A pane of low thermal expansion glass.

Can be fitted into the freighter hull to open up a view into space.

title: Remembrance
description: Everything you ever knew is within.

title: Resonance Amplifier
description: An attachment for the Multi-Tool Scanner, designed by 40px/23px/40px) (PS4/PC/Xbox) to locate sentience echoes. On arrival at an echo site, use (20px/40px/40px) (PC/PS/XB) to fully reveal nearby anomalies.

title: Resonance Matrix
description:
Sideloads a resonant memory packet into your warp computer, allowing the ship to pass through the dissonant space surrounding purple stellar bodies.

User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems via the Galactic Map.

title: Roamer Geobay
description: An underground secure parking facility for the Roamer medium Exocraft.

title: Rocket Boots
description:
Equips the Exosuit jetpack with advanced jump capabilities, allowing the user to take huge leaps with ease.

Activate jump systems by rapidly pressing 25px/45px/25px (PS4/PC/Xbox).

title: Rocket Launcher
description:
A long range starship weapon, capable of delivering a highly explosive torpedo across massive distances.

Note: explosive damage is highly effective against unshielded targets, but ineffective against shielded targets.

Use () to change weapon mode. Press () to fire.

title: Rolled Canvas
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Rolled Canvas Pile
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Rounded Flat Stone Roof
description:
Reinforced Stone building module, widespread in basic structures across the galaxy.

Conforms to Universal Building Standards 2.3b, ensuring maximum compatibilty with other prefab structurs. Rapid Grid snapping allows for quick assembly of custom shelter layouts

title: Rounded Flat Timber-Glass Roof
description:
Reinforced Timber building module, widespread in basic structures across the galaxy.

Conforms to Universal Building Standards 2.3b, ensuring maximum compatibilty with other prefab structurs. Rapid Grid snapping allows for quick assembly of custom shelter layouts

title: Rounded Standing Light
description: A low-energy consumption light, with an extended lifespan and fully recyclable components.

title: Rounded Timber Roof
description:
Reinforced Timber building module, widespread in basic structures across the galaxy.

Conforms to Universal Building Standards 2.3b, ensuring maximum compatibilty with other prefab structurs. Rapid Grid snapping allows for quick assembly of custom shelter layouts

title: Salvaged Data
description:
The salvageable heart of some ancient technology. Unreadable in its current form.

These databanks can be spent at a Construction Research Unit and used to research new Construction Blueprints.

title: Salvaged Frigate Module
description:
A technology module harvested from the remains of a large interstellar starship. May be collected from freighter crashsites or salvaged during frigate expeditions.

Useless in its current form, a Research Station aboard your freighter may be able to convert it into useable technology.

title: Salvaged Glass
description:
A sinister shard of purple glass, salvaged from the destroyed remains of Sentinel machinery. Its walls are thin, and it may be broken down to access valuable Sentinel components.

Select in the Inventory (

title: Salvaged Upgrade Components
description: Salvaged Upgrade Components, contained within upgrades that grant various bonuses to your Exosuit.

title: Save Point
description: A buildable save point for managing your progress.

title: Scaffolding
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Scan Harmoniser
description:
An attachment for the Multi-Tool Scanner that allows the device to detect and decode the cloaking signal of nearby Autophage units.

Use 40px/20px/40px (PS/PC/XB) to activate the Scanner. As its detector waveform passes over the local area, it will automatically reveal any nearby Autophage entities.

title: Scanner
description:
A Personal Surface Radar augmentation for the Multi-Tool.

The Scanner releases a high-energy pulse that reveals any critical survival resources in the immediate area. Data is transmitted via the Exosuit directly into the user's visual nervous system.

Press 40px/20px/40px (PS4/PC/Xbox) to activate a local scan.

infobox.desc: Used to discover resources and points of interest.

title: Scanner Room
description:
Advanced integrated freighter equipment. Upon use, this planetary scanner probes all celestial bodies in the local solar system. This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.

Scanned moons and planets are Discovered, and sensors collect high-level data such as weather conditions and prominent resources.

title: Scatter Blaster Upgrade
description: Scatter Blaster Upgrades, contained within Scatter Blaster Modules, are procedurally generated upgrades granting bonuses to a Multi-tool's Scatter Blaster.

title: Science Specialist's Room
description:
Integrated freighter research equipment tailored to the needs of scientists, and equipped for research and development of scientific blueprints.

This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.

title: Science Terminal
description: A research station tailored to the needs of Scientists, and equipped for research and development of scientific blueprints.

title: Scissor Lift
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Scream Suppressor
description:
This small extension to the ship's automated defence network appears to be its own autonomous organizm. A small mouth in the centre of its flesh hungers for Pugneum.

During combat, it seems to hijack the neurological array and prevent fear of pain from traumatising the rest of the ship's body.

infobox.desc: Prevents fear of pain from trumatising the rest of the ship's body.

title: Sealed Barrel
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Sealed Reservoir
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Self-Greasing Servos
description: An automatically-regulated lubricant dispenser fitted to the leg joints of the Minotaur reduce

description: An anomalous upgrade for Exosuit. Use (

description: An anomalous upgrade for the Multi-Tool's Weapon Systems. Use (

title: Shell Greaser
description: Advanced self-lubricating components decrease friction within the Scatter Blaster, offering significant improvements to reload times.

title: Shield Lattice
description: Increase the base capacity of the Hazard Protection system, allowing the user to spend longer in hazardous environments without recharging their Exosuit.

title: Ship Sale Poster
description: Self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

title: Short Alloy Wall A
description:
Reinforced Alloy building module, widespread in basic structures across the galaxy.

Conforms to Universal Building Standards 2.3b, ensuring maximum compatibilty with other prefab structurs. Rapid Grid snapping allows for quick assembly of custom shelter layouts

Reinforced Alloy building module, widespread in basic structures across the galaxy.

title: Signal Booster
description:
A versatile scanner that detects nearby buildings. Can decrypt Navigation Data to pinpoint specific locations.

The Signal Booster can be dismantled and redeployed for easy transportation.

title: Simple Translator
description:
An Automatic translation device. It records and parses nearby conversations before running the data through a contextual learning system to determine intended meaning.

Low memory capacity on this entry-level model limits translation capacity.

title: Singularity Engine
description:
An unstable and highly-experimental piece of freighter hyperdrive technology. This extreme gravity device generates a wormhole deep within the freighter's reactor core, inverting the entire vessel and transporting it across the universe.

Speak to the freighter's commander to engage the drive. Warning: destination is not controllable.

title: Solar Mirror
description:
A specialist optical component. Employing an impossibly polished surface, this mirror is able to selectively filter different wavelengths of light, changing its reflective pattern based on nearby magnetic fields.

Used in the creation of a wide range of advanced technologies.

title: Solar Panel
description:
An efficient power generator, this solar array will turn sunlight into the electrical energy required to power many base structures.

Generates no power at night. Partner with Batteries to store energy for the hours of darkness.

title: Solar Ray
description:
A highly specialised addition to the Multi-Tool's mining capabilities, transforming terrain deposits into liquid sun.

A powerful laser array amplifies local solar radiation, allowing for the rapid reconfiguration of nearby mineral ores.

title: Spark Plug
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Spawning Sac
description: Increases Living starship inventory

title: Sphere
description: Basic structural buildable item.

title: Sphere Creator
description:
A highly-specific fabrication device, developed with the intention of finding the universe's most perfect sphere.

Requires power to operate. Will create a large sphere, ready for whatever experiments are deemed necessary.

title: Splayed hanging Lamp
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Spool of Nano-Cables
description: A valuable piece of broken down Trade Terminal.

title: Square Deepwater Chamber
description: A square alternative to the core module for base construction, providing a generous central space on which to expand.

title: Squared Standing Light
description: A low-energy consumption light, with an extended lifespan and fully recyclable components.

title: Star Seed
description:
The smallest of sparks, housed within a containment field of unknown origins.

The seed glows with life, desperate to escape and fulfill its potential.

title: Starship AI Valves
description: A valuable piece of broken down Trade Terminal.

title: Starship scanner technology
description: The Starship comes with Scanner Technology installed that can determine the qualities of a system or planet. The scanner can be upgraded to scan the wealth or Conflict Level of other systems that the player is not currently located within.

title: Stasis Device
description:
A device specifically crafted to keep lifeforms alive for thousands of years longer than their natural lifespan. Such a device requires great skill to manufacture, as not only is it technically complex, but the consequences for a user in the event of malfunction would be disastrous.

Crafted from Quantum Processors, Cryogenic Chambers, and Iridesite.

title: Stellar Extractor Room
description:
Advanced integrated freighter equipment. Gathers resources directly from the interstellar medium, via a complex system of suction intakes and condensing tubes. The gathered substance varies with the local star classification.

This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.

title: Storage Augmentation
description:
A technology module harvested from the remains of a salvaged starship. May also be collected from freighter crash sites or salvaged during frigate expeditions.

Can be used to expand starship storage capacity at the Space Station's Starship Outfitter.

title: Storage Room
description:
Hybrid high-capacity storage unit shelving module for installation in interstellar freighters. This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.

Inventory capacity interfaces directly with planetary Storage Containers, and the module may be renamed for ease of identification.

title: Sub-Light Amplifier
description:
A highly advanced upgrade for the Pulse Engine, vastly increasing interplanetary speed.

Naturally occuring frameshift effects within the Pulse Engine are amplified by tritium-based resonators, increasing its maximum sub-light speed.

title: Subatomic Regulators
description: A valuable piece of broken down Trade Terminal.

title: Supply Pipe
description:
Flexible high strength piping. Able to withstand a highly pressurised internal environment.

Used for connecting various Mineral and Silos.

title: Survey Device
description:
A self-contained circuitry upgrade for the Analysis Visor, adding real-time analysis to the scanning array.

Toggle between Visor mode with 1/3. Use Surveying Mode to detect hidden terrain resources.

title: Suspicious Packet (Arms)
description:
A suspicious looking parcel, acquired via an unusual transaction. The seller indicated it contained some sort of weapon-based technology.

Select in the Inventory (40px/40px/30px (PC/PS/XB)) and use 20px/25px/25px (PC/PS/XB) to examine the contents. No refunds.

title: Suspicious Packet (Goods)
description:
A suspicious looking parcel, acquired via an unusual transaction. The seller indicated it contained some sort of technology.

Select in the Inventory (40px/40px/30px (PC/PS/XB)) and use 20px/25px/25px (PC/PS/XB) to examine the contents. No refunds.

title: Suspicious Packet (Tech)
description:
A suspicious looking parcel, acquired via an unusual transaction. The seller indicated it contained some sort of high-value or interesting item.

Select in the Inventory (40px/40px/30px (PC/PS/XB)) and use 20px/25px/25px (PC/PS/XB) to examine the contents. No refunds.

title: Swept Sofa
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: T-Shaped Glass Tunnel
description:
Pressurised, reinforced glass tunnels for deep-sea construction.

Advanced nano-mineral coating ensures high performance at depth, without compromising visibility.

title: Table Lamp
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Tall Antenna
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Tall Bucket
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

description:

Conforms to Universal Building Standards 2.3b, ensuring maximum compatibilty with other prefab structurs. Rapid Grid snapping allows for quick assembly of custom shelter layouts

title: Tall Moulded Lockbox
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Tank of Coolant
description: A valuable piece of broken down Trade Terminal.

title: Technology Merchant
description:
Technology Merchant is a merchant NPC that can be found in some of the small planetary buildings with Landing Pads and on space stations.
They sell technology blueprints for Nanite Clusters and products for units.

title: Teleport Chamber
description:
Vital integrated freighter equipment. This personal teleport device allows the user to move quickly between their freighter, planetary bases, as well as any Space Station Terminuses connected to their network. User is urged to verify network integrity before inserting any matter they cannot afford to become separated from.

This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.

title: Teleport Receiver
description:
A device that modulates standard starship communication signals to enable the transport of matter as well as data.

Starships fitted with such a device can send and receive products and substances to a user's exosuit over a long distance.

title: Teleportation Terminal
description: A teleportation interface providing direct access to known locations, including bases, stations, and freighter systems.

infobox.desc: Enables direct teleportation to known locations

title: Temporal Warp Computer
description:
Upgrades the hyperdrive's computational matrix, preventing temporal anomalies when attempting to reach rare-class blue stellar bodies.

User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems via the Galactic Map.

title: Terrain Manipulator
description:
Advanced terraforming device. This modules overloads existing multi-tool systems, allowing the user to reshape regions as they wish.

Charged with metallic elements.

title: Tethys Beam
description:
A mounted laser system specifically designed for the Nautilon Submarine.

Fires a concentrated plasma beam towards the intended target, which is then ignited. Such a trigger mechanism allows the use of high-energy optical mining systems in a liquid medium.

title: Thermal Buffer
description: Sublimation cooling vents and high-thermal mass buffers are installed in all structural panels, keeping the Exocraft pilot at non-lethal temperatures even in the most overwhelming of firestorms.

title: Thermal Panels
description: A valuable piece of broken down Trade Terminal.

title: Thermal Protection Module (Cold)
description: Increase the base capacity of the Hazard Protection system, allowing the user to spend longer in frozen sub-zero temperature environments without requiring a recharge of the traveler's  Hazard Protection Unit in the Exosuit.

title: Thermal Protection Module (Heat)
description: Increase the base capacity of the Hazard Protection system, allowing the user to spend longer in high temperature environments without requiring a recharge of the traveller's  Hazard Protection Unit in the Exosuit.

title: Thermal Protection Upgrade (Cold)
description: Thermal Protection Upgrades (Cold), contained within Thermal Protection Modules, are procedurally generated upgrades granting supplementary protection against low temperatures.

title: Trade Rocket
